hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from Department department where 1 = 1 and ( lower(department.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' or lower(department.shortName) like '%${shortName?lower_case}%' or exists ( select entityUuid from Pinyin pinyin where pinyin.entityUuid = department.uuid and pinyin.type = 'Department' and lower(pinyin.pinyin) like '${pinyin?lower_case}%' ) ) order by code asc,name
